net.margaritov.preference.colorpicker

Class ColorPickerPanelView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • net.margaritov.preference.colorpicker.ColorPickerPanelView

  • public class ColorPickerPanelView
extends View
    This class draws a panel which which will be filled with a color which can be set. It can be used to show the currently selected color which you will get from the ColorPickerView.
    Author:
    Daniel Nilsson
